Articles.Content:
It's been a concept in my head for a while now, and I started it a few days ago in 0.23.5 with mods. The main ones being KW, AIES, Deadly Reentry, FAR, KEngineer and RealChutes.

So what's it all about? Well, here it goes:

I picked a few good friends of mine (who don't play KSP), explained them the game and then asked them what planet/moon would they like. So the goal is to land on every planet and moon in the Kerbol system and on every one plant a flag with a name of one of my friends who picked that planet/moon. I started with the Mun and on every landing on the plaque I wrote something about the project. The last mission will be to go to Eeloo and plant the flag for my girlfriend. I'll be keeping track of the missions below:

Moho -

Eve -

Gilly -

Mun - done (2nd mission), the plaque says: "Our journey continues, bringing us to the Mun, we have only begun..."

Minmus - done (1st mission), the plaque says: "Here begins our journey to conquer the Kerbol system, we have a lot of work to do..."

Duna -

Ike -

Dres -

Laythe -

Vall -

Tylo -

Bop -

Pol -

Eeloo -

Also, I'd like to hear your opinion on this project.
